Subbed Projects.Show Name: Darker than Black: Kuro no Keiyakusha

Good Comments: Quite slow in subbing, but definitely the B-E-S-T for DtB. Files are released in AVI and MKV.
Shinsen Subs had great fonts, lyrics, encoding and very good translation .
Good quality in all aspects, good subs.
i found it the most easiest to follow
Bad Comments: Same as Shinsen-Subs, for the later episodes.
Good quality. Nice timing, typesetting, editing and translations. Recommended subbers for DtB.
Low translation accuracy. Lack of checking? I was also shocked at one point, someone buys an umbrella for 짜480 which somehow got through QC as 짜450.
A quite good job all around, well done!
So far, so good. Quality is great for its age. Definitely Shinsen in disguise.
Clear and easy to read subtitles
Excellent Subs, Karaoke, timing...All the Best Shinsen...oh! I mean Syndicate ;D

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Tokyo Majin Gakuen Kenpucho: Tou Dai Ni Maku

Good Comments: Good quality translation, but the colors look worse than the raw version.
Bad Comments: Well...it's the only group subbing this must watch series.
